summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from September 23, 2019, regarding a tip sent to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York about the Epstein investigation. The tip alleges a pilot for Bill Clinton may be a sexual predator and could be involved in the Epstein scandal, and offers to provide more information.

events.title: Tip forwarded to SDNY regarding Epstein investigation
events.description: An email tip alleging a pilot for Bill Clinton may be a sexual predator and potentially involved in the Epstein scandal is forwarded within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: A tip was received by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on September 23, 2019, regarding the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The tip alleges a pilot who worked for Bill Clinton may be a sexual predator and could be involved in the Epstein scandal.
The tipster claims to be one of the pilot's 'abandoned children' and offers to provide more information, stating they live in London but have close knowledge of the individual.
The tipster suggests the pilot's flight manifests and lifestyle should be examined, and notes the pilot's son is a National Security Adviser.
The email demonstrates the practice of the U.S. Attorney's Office to forward every tip received regarding the Epstein investigation.
